text: Sergei Anatolievich Yashin (6 March 1962 â€“ 12 April 2022) was a Russian professional ice hockey left winger. Yashin played in the Soviet Hockey League for HC Dynamo Moscow. He was also a member of the Soviet Union national ice hockey team and played in the 1988 Winter Olympics where he won a gold medal. Yashin was born in Penza, Soviet Union. Yashin died on 12 April 2022 at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian ice hockey left wingers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Sergei Yashin
